attributes.action: Ban worldwide industrial fishing and Ban misleading dolphin safe Tuna labels.
attributes.additional_details: The Government should support this as it could hugely protect our oceans for the near future.
attributes.background: To make it illegal for companies to false advertise Dolphin safe Tuna in all supermarkets in the UK and to stop supporting charities who work beside industrial fishing company’s.

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. The UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for worldwide fishing.
